text: Mach, ui haŋonaŋg Jonɨnd sezɨr hamb unsa wɨv akarɨmŋgɨzand wɨram untɨm Farisindɨvez unsa wɨv akarɨmŋgɨmar. Unsa wɨv akare ñɨmŋgɨzand, osa anchɨ hamb ai Jisasɨh amarɨmŋgɨmar. Utɨndɨv Jonɨnd sezɨr hamb unsa wɨv akare ñɨmŋgɨzand wɨram untɨm Farisind sezɨr hambez unsa wɨv akarɨmŋgɨmbɨri arɨmŋgɨmar. Amakɨr sezarɨp nend arɨmŋgɨmar.
